    Robust Inner Loop Control of a 6-DOF Rotary Wing Unmanned Aircraft System

    Control Theory Robust Control Matlab

    This report describes the process of synthesizing a series of inner loop controllers using H ∞ and μ synthesis techniques for an 11 state rotary wing micro air vehicle with analysis of their robustness properties.

    07 May 2019

    Sampling and Reconstruction

    Control Theory Matlab

    This report describes the Shannon Sampling Theorem and how its properties can be applied to the Nyquist frequency using a sample signal. Signal aliasing can be attributed to sampling and reconstruction, which will be proven with an example signal in combination with different filters for convolution.
